qas.question: When did the BBC start exploring the use of internet streaming?
When was full coverage of the BBC's standard programming launched in online stream format?
In what month of 2008 did the BBC begin to experiment with live streaming?
What year were all channels able to be streamed online?

context: In <a0_0>2008<a0_0/>, the BBC began experimenting with live streaming of certain channels in the UK, and in <a1_0><b2_0>November<b2_0/> <b3_0>2008<b3_0/><a1_0/>, all standard BBC television channels were made available to watch online.
